/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape.
